org.alienideology.jcord.util.log

Class Logger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.alienideology.jcord.util.log.Logger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Logger
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Logger - Official Logger for JCord. This logger supports printing 2 streams, one as default, one as the error output. It can also logs to files with individual filters attach to the file, making logging customisable.
    Author:
    AlienIdeology
    See Also:
    For different modes of this logger, used to turn on/off and filter logger output., For different levels of this logger., Serialized Form

      • addFileLog

        public Logger addFileLog(java.util.function.Predicate<LogLevel> filter,
                         java.io.File file)
        Add a file to the logger output. You can filter the logs by using the following predicate, or pass null to the predicate to get all logs (that are granted by the LogMode).
        Parameters:
        filter - The log filter.
        file - The file to output to.
        Returns:
        Logger for chaining.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException -
        • If the file does not exist or is read-only.
        • If the file is already added.

      • removeFileLog

        public Logger removeFileLog(java.io.File file)
        Remove a file from the logger. If the file was not added, then this method will do nothing and return.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to remove.
        Returns:
        Logger for chaining.
